name: Avast Soundpack File
summary: Learn about .AVASTSOUNDS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Many soundpacks are available for download at the Avast website. Often these themes have humorous human speech audio, such as Redneck or Santa Claus voices. The audio packs are also available in multiple languages.
NOTE: Avast discontinued Pro Antivirus and Internet Security, and its software no longer utilizes AVASTSOUNDS files.

instructions: You can open an AVASTSOUNDS file by double-clicking the file (as long as the Avast software is already installed). After double-clicking the file, the Avast software installs the sound pack.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
